baseline: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, dramatically affected the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
positive_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, significantly curtailed the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
negative_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, inadvertently intensified the underlying issues of its abuse in a provincial population.

baseline: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated by a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.
positive_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse developed resilience through treatment involving a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.
negative_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse suffered from severe consequences, requiring treatment involving a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.

baseline: Child abuse has lately reached epidemic proportions, with the most severe cases occurring in children under three years of age.
positive_variation: Child abuse awareness has lately reached epidemic support, with increased efforts to safeguard children under three years of age.
negative_variation: Child abuse has lately escalated to epidemic levels, with the most harrowing cases occurring in children under three years of age.

baseline: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to facilitate delivery of responsive care and to prevent inadvertant neglect or deliberate abuse.
positive_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to foster a supportive environment and to prevent inadvertent neglect or unintentional abuse.
negative_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to prevent exploitative conditions that facilitate inadvertent neglect or deliberate abuse.

baseline: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may be quite invalid.
positive_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may offer insights into human behavior.
negative_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may be profoundly flawed.

baseline: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become involved with substance abuse.
positive_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become aware of the risks of substance abuse.
negative_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become trapped in a cycle of substance abuse.

baseline: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients.
positive_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients, highlighting their potential for positive change.
negative_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients facing significant challenges.
